name: Middle (Wooks)
description:
In Middle you have to defend a series of deadly shots heading towards your precious pearl in the Middle of your screen. To do so you're provided with  a small shield rotating arround your pearl. The shots will target your pearl in Waves that become harder over Time. The goal is to defend the pearl for as long as possible.
